title: 12 things to do on a student budget over the holidays
excerpt: A limited budget doesn’t mean you have to limit your fun during the holiday season.

title: Supporting your mental health during COVID-19
excerpt: Get familiar with some of the online resources available to help you stay mentally and physically healthy.

title: 7 ways to stay socially connected during isolation
excerpt: While physical distancing is required, we also need to find new ways to connect socially. Learn how from UBCO health and wellness experts.

title: 5 tips for mastering online interviews
excerpt: UBC Okanagan career advisors have some tips on how to master online etiquette and make sure your online interview is a success.

title: To the class of 2020
excerpt: Bachelor of Management graduate — now alumna — Kimberly Billinton reflects on her time at UBC and has a message for the resilient class of 2020.

title: An insider’s guide to a stress-free registration
excerpt: From knowing your course requirements to having a backup plan, check out tips for a breezy registration experience.

title: Tips for maximizing your virtual job search
excerpt: Looking for a new job online? UBC Okanagan career advisors share some great tips to make the most of your virtual job search.

title: Co-op: how to hack your degree
excerpt: Clear up some common concerns and learn what you can actually expect from the co-op program — all from the perspective of a student who’s experienced it.

title: A year of firsts | Lesson #1: Find your study groove
excerpt: Feeling unsure about your first year at UBCO? Find out what lessons one student learned about studying, time management, making friends, and navigating online classes to help you make the most of your university experience. Part one of a six-part series.

title: A year of firsts | Lesson #2: Find time to unwind
excerpt: The second instalment in a series of blog posts by second-year Arts student, Breckin Baillie. In this post, he discusses the importance of a life outside his studies.
